short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the views indicator from tweets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes the views counter that was recently added to Twitter.
